Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory72.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tch... of course it's you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "(Removes her weapon from the guard) Huh? Oh! You're both here!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Do you have to make such a fuss?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well, Nanami can't just let Roland get away...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Roland?! Where is he?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I don't know! Nanami's looking for him as well!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Isn't it Kamui's mission to hunt the Ascendant...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Can't believe how messy this whole situation is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Then, should we... go after the Ascendant? Or continue our mission?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "(Announce his thoughts loudly) I've seen with my own eyes how the antigen affected Roland and the Punishing Virus...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Nanami said Roland's still inside the Golden Vortex... Think about it. He's barely hanging on, but he's still staying here. If you ask me, I bet he's here for one reason—to destroy the antigen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That makes sense. The Ascendants wouldn't allow the antigen to threaten them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "The antigen is still a rogue element right now—no one has weaponized it yet. If I were Roland, I'd be mad anxious.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Before its weaponization, the Ascendants will do whatever it takes to destroy the antigen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Although it isn't stable, it's still going to help Earth out in a huge way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're right. We can't let Roland destroy it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Nanami, I need some leads on Roland. Anything. Don't skip any detail...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "...Nanami isn't sure, either. But the guards can help!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami holds up a circular component in gold taken from a guard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What are you trying to do? Enough with the theatrics!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'This golden circle can control the guards...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is going to hack it and finds out which guards have been taken down by Roland! Then we just have to follow the bodies!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's brilliant, Nanami!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: "As long as Roland's in the Golden Vortex, the guards here are going to find him before we do! They're going to leave a lot of bodies behind when they fight—finding the bodies means finding Roland!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's right! Hehe!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Mumbles) Who would've thought... They're pretty alright...", 4: '1'}
